\dWow, the weather sure turned out great.\d%K%P
The day of the festival turned out to be a\nbeautifully clear fall day. %K%P
\dMornin' Akira. All finished up on your end?\d%K%P
\dYeah, we should be set.\d%K%P
We had even finished setting up the lighting and\nhad set up the braziers for the evening.%K%P
A few stalls were up and ready for business, too.%K%P
\dHow 'bout the Goddesses?\d%K%P
\dCan't really speak for them. But it seems like\nthey're all ready in their own way.\d%K%P
Kaede had some cooking prep to do and headed out\nto the store first thing in the morning.%K%P
Her food plans included lots of our regular\nvisitors and had the place in a bit of a commotion.%K%P
\dAkira, I'm about to head out.\d%K%P
\dNghhh, so heavy... What have you got in this\nthing...?\d%K%P
Shion must have been in charge of carrying things,\nbecause she was lugging around a huge stockpot.%K%P
\dNeed some help?\d%K%P
\dReally? Thank you!!!\d%K%P
\dNot so fast! He's busy enough, you know.\d%K%P
\dBut...\d%K%P
\dJust be thankful that pot's not full.\d%K%P
Shion was ready to use Kaede to her own benefit,\nbut Kaede seemed to be making her work for it.%K%P
Shion couldn't back down now after agreeing to\nhelp.%K%P
\dI'll see you all out there, then.\d%K%P
Yukari was by my side before I noticed.%K%P
She was waving her hands, trying to shoo the others\naway.%K%P
\dWhat did you decide on doing anyway, Yukari? I\ndidn't even see you preparing anything.\d%K%P
\dEhehe, that's because I'm not doing anything.\d%K%P
\dThough... You could say I'm going on a date.\d%K%P
And just like that she locked her arms with mine.%K%P
\dA festival date?!\d%K%P
\dWait, what? Not fair!\d%K%P
\dYukari...?\d%K%P
\dI want to get everyone excited from seeing Akira\nand I enjoying ourselves here as a lovey-dovey\ncouple.\d%K%P
\dI'm sure after seeing us together the night will\nbe filled with confessions of love among the men\nand women.\d%K%P
\dOh it's truly such a brilliant plan! I'm certain\neveryone will applaud our efforts.\d%K%P
So that's what Yukari's plan was.%K%P
It wasn't much of a 'plan' really, but it would\nlook impressive to our visitors.%K%P
\dSo that's it, huh... You got us good.\d%K%P
\dSo you're keeping Aki to yourself for the whole\nfestival?\d%K%P
\dGo on now, you must have plenty of work to do.\nYou just leave Akira to me.\d%K%P
\dYou're just gonna help Yukari like that, Aki?\d%K%P
\dI don't know about help, but I planned on heading\naround to see the festival anyway, so...\d%K%P
\dJust make sure you visit my booth too, okay...?\d%K%P
\dIf you don't I may have to get\nuncharacteristically mad.\d%K%P
Kaede's pouting was so cute.%K%P
It was clear as day what would happen if I didn't\ndrop by her booth.%K%P
\dI'll be there. Of course I will.\d%K%P
\dAnd do the stamp collection too! I'll be at the\nmain desk ready and waiting for you!\d%K%P
\dYeah, yeah.\d%K%P
It wouldn't be fair if I didn't.%K%P
I had to spend time with the other two as well.%K%P
\dCan't keep everyone waiting. I'll be going.\d%K%P
\dDon't you go giving into Yukari's temptations.\d%K%P
\dYeah, absolutely not!\d%K%P
\dBye-bye now!\d%K%P
Yukari waved them off with a huge smile on her\nface.%K%P
Her other hand was locked tightly around mine.%K%P
\dNow then Akira.\d%K%P
\dLet's have ourselves a lovely date today!\d%K%P
Traditional music was playing all around.%K%P
The main spots were the shrine and around the\nfalls, but anywhere you looked there were people\neverywhere.%K%P
\dThis is all so exciting!\d%K%P
\dYeah, it's like you can feel how happy everyone\nis.\d%K%P
Seeing all this now made me realize how much of a\nmistake it would have been to call off the\nfestival.%K%P
The people needed the festival. It was an important\ntime for this small community to enjoy themselves.%K%P
\dI definitely understand why young people would\nwant to profess their love here. Even I want to!\d%K%P
\dGetting a bit ahead of yourself, don't you think?\d%K%P
\dYou think?\d%K%P
She drew flirtatiously closer to me.%K%P
Normally the others would stop her in an instant,\nbut today Yukari had free reign and was making full\nuse of it.%K%P
\dDon't go forgetting what today is all about.\d%K%P
\dWell, that's up to you now, isn't it?\d%K%P
With her like this already, would we even make it\nthrough to the evening?%K%P
I wasn't sure I could keep up with her all day.%K%P
\dGaaah... I'm exhausted...\d%K%P
Heading to the store, we found Shion sitting there\nmaking it quite clear she was worn out.%K%P
\dHey Shion, just wanted to check up on you.\d%K%P
\dAki! What'd you bring for me?!\d%K%P
\dHey, at least do your job first.\d%K%P
\dAll I'm doing is just handing out stamp cards.\d%K%P
By 'handing out' she meant she had them in a pile.%K%P
She should have been explaining things and trying\nto draw people in, but she lacked any motivation.%K%P
\dI wish I was on a date with you too...\d%K%P
\dHehehe, jealous, huh?\d%K%P
\dOf course! You really pulled one over on us!\d%K%P
Shion had put in the most planning, but even still\nYukari had found a way to beat her.%K%P
\dBut whatever, I'm still going to win in the polls.\nAnd then I'm gonna use my favor to ask for an even\nbetter date.\d%K%P
\dJust what kind of date, exactly?\d%K%P
\dH-H-Hey now... Don't make a girl say such things,\nsheesh.\d%K%P
\dThat sort of cutesy stuff doesn't work for\nflat-chested girls, you know.\d%K%P
\dYou watch your mouth!\d%K%P
They might be small, but Shion wasn't flat.%K%P
This was just an unfair comparison.%K%P
\dAkira? Where are those eyes of yours wandering?\d%K%P
A darkness was forming around Yukari.%K%P
\dJeez, hold that back.\d%K%P
\dIf you want to stare at any bosom mine should be\nmore than enough.\d%K%P
\dFYI, he's more about shape than size!\d%K%P
\dDon't put words in my mouth!\d%K%P
This argument was pointless.%K%P
Yukari and Shion each had their strong points.%K%P
\dAnyway, we're gonna do the stamp collection thing,\nso give us our papers.\d%K%P
\dM'kay. I'd recommend the buttered sweet potatoes!\d%K%P
\dThat sounds good.\d%K%P
\dMrs. Iwakura!\d%K%P
\dHey there!\d%K%P
Mrs. Iwakura was right beside Shion and handed us\na fresh batch of buttered sweet potatoes.%K%P
\dAre uhh, you in charge of these, Mrs. Iwakura?\d%K%P
\dIt's easy, I just sprinkle some salt on them once\nthey're fried and butter them up.\d%K%P
\dThey look so hot and yummy! Now then, Akira!\d%K%P
\dOpen up!\d%K%P
\dHey, that's not fair!\d%K%P
\dWhy not? We're on a date! This is what we do!\d%K%P
I just accepted the food presented to me.%K%P
\dAhh, sho hoff!\d%K%P
\dAre they too hot? Want me to kiss it away?\d%K%P
\dThat wouldn't do anything!\d%K%P
\dMff... Ngh, no I'm fine...\d%K%P
Fresh out of the fryer they were super hot, but\ncombined with the melted butter they were\ndelicious.%K%P
\dOkay, now it's my turn!\d%K%P
\dAll right, open up!\d%K%P
Shion sneakily placed the super hot sweet potatoes\ninto Yukari's mouth.%K%P
\dNghhh! Owowowoww! That's HOT!\d%K%P
\dWell? Wanna kiss to cool it down?\d%K%P
\dN-No thank you!\d%K%P
And so without feeding each other we got our first\nstamp.%K%P
Since we were all the way out here we headed to\nthe falls.%K%P
The surrounding red leaves were at their peak, and\nthere were more tourists than ever.%K%P
\dThere are so many people.\d%K%P
\dThere were plenty at the store, too.\d%K%P
Maybe it was thanks to Shion, but there were tons\nmore people than usual.%K%P
\dSo many people with stamp cards, too.\d%K%P
\dLooks like Shion did a good job.\d%K%P
This was definitely something Yukari and Kaede\ncouldn't have done.%K%P
I definitely couldn't have done it either.%K%P
\dBut the problem is, does anyone even know that\nshe put this all together?\d%K%P
\dI really doubt she would have slipped up there.\nHer face was all over the ads and all.\d%K%P
Shion looking all innocent dressed up in her\nGoddess garb definitely drew attention, too.%K%P
Goddesses might not be all that rare these days,\nbut they were still effective for getting the word\nout.%K%P
\dStill...this makes me nervous.\d%K%P
A crowd had built up around the stall at the falls.%K%P
It was much more lively compared to Shion's stall.%K%P
\dHere's our festival-only special menu item, autumn\nchestnut zenzai!\d%K%P
\dI'll take one!\d%K%P
\dI'll take one, too!\d%K%P
It was a total hit.%K%P
Made by Kaede's hands, it was guaranteed to be\ndelicious.%K%P
\dWith a lovely gal like Kaede selling it, it's\nbound to be popular.\d%K%P
\dHey!\d%K%P
\dWhat's the matter?\d%K%P
\dWhat about this 'lovely gal' right here...?\d%K%P
\dRight, sorry. I shouldn't talk like that while I'm\nwith you.\d%K%P
\dYou're practically cheating on me while we're\nstill on a date.\d%K%P
She was mostly just joking, but if she actually got\nmad I'd be in trouble.%K%P
\dWanna try some?\d%K%P
\dHmm, maybe not.\d%K%P
\dWe can't get a stamp if we don't, though...\d%K%P
\dFine. Just a bit, then. Let's hurry, get the\nstamp, and get out.\d%K%P
At least she agreed to try.%K%P
But she was acting way different than she had with\nShion. I guess she was much more worried about\nKaede.%K%P
\dHey Kaede, we're here to try some.\d%K%P
\dAkira! Welcome!\d%K%P
Her face changed from her sales smile to a more\nnatural one.%K%P
\dThe chestnut dish, right? Just one? Two?\d%K%P
\dOne, please.\d%K%P
\dSo you're going to share, huh...?\d%K%P
\dWe certainly can't eat two.\d%K%P
We had eaten two of those sweet potatoes, though.%K%P
Still, if we got two of everything, we probably\nwouldn't be able to finish collecting all the\nstamps.%K%P
\dWell, here you are then. Chestnut zenzai.\d%K%P
\dThanks, Kaede.\d%K%P
\dYou can pay right over here. And here's your\nstamp.\d%K%P
\dThere. Done. Sorry for the trouble. Let's eat over\nthere, Akira.\d%K%P
\dIt's fine, you can eat right here.\d%K%P
\dGotcha chairs all set already!\d%K%P
Mr. Shirane was there helping Kaede.%K%P
He showed strength beyond his age and carried over\nchairs for us.%K%P
Sitting down watching the falls made the food taste\neven better than expected.%K%P
\dNice to have something warm to eat.\d%K%P
\dIt tastes good too. The chestnuts are great. Kaede\ndid a good job.\d%K%P
\dIf you really like it I can make it for you again\nafter the festival.\d%K%P
\dThat'd be nice. It'd taste even better in winter.\d%K%P
The end of the festival marked the coming of\nwinter.%K%P
Once the snow settled in on Kamimori, it was even\nquieter and had fewer people than normal.%K%P
\dThis'll be your first winter here, huh Yukari?\d%K%P
\dYeah. Does it snow a lot?\d%K%P
\dEnough to ski, even.\d%K%P
\dYou could always stay back at the rear shrine if\nyou want to avoid the snow.\d%K%P
\dNo, I will stay right here with Akira through any\nseason...\d%K%P
\dWe could go to warm up sometimes, though.\d%K%P
\dIndeed.\d%K%P
\dI suppose I'll have to adjust the barrier.\d%K%P
Finishing up our food we left the falls.%K%P
Yukari seemed to be thinking something over.%K%P
\dWhat's the matter?\d%K%P
\dOh... I was just thinking about something...\d%K%P
The rear shrine and its endless summer.%K%P
The former Tatarigami Kaede and current Tatarigami\nYukari.%K%P
We suddenly found ourselves heading for the sacred\nforest.%K%P
\dThe festival is everywhere but here, huh...\d%K%P
\dBecause this place is sacred. Not exactly a place\nto go all out.\d%K%P
You could practically hear the summer cicadas\ncalling through the air in there.%K%P
Looking at the lush green of the forest really\npulled you out of the fall festival mood.%K%P
\dYukari.\d%K%P
I said her name and took her hand.%K%P
\dAkira...\d%K%P
She gripped my hand back.%K%P
Her Tatari wasn't out. I just wanted to hold hands.%K%P
\dWhat are you going to do?\d%K%P
\dWhat do you mean, what...?\d%K%P
\dI...just don't know.\d%K%P
\dI don't know if this is good enough or if I should\ntry and do something...\d%K%P
\dWhat do you think, Akira?\d%K%P
\dHmm...\d%K%P
Even I didn't know how to answer.%K%P
\dWanna get going? We're not finished with our date\nyet.\d%K%P
\dSure.\d%K%P
I let go of her hand and we linked arms.%K%P
That brought us back to normal.%K%P
At least, I felt it did.%K%P
\dWhew... I'm stuffed...\d%K%P
With fried manju and some skewered food in hand I\nwas feeling too stuffed to go on.%K%P
\dNeed some help?\d%K%P
\dNo, I got this...\d%K%P
My pride kept me from giving up. Yukari was\nperfectly fine, and somehow that really got to me.%K%P
\dHow many stamps did we end up getting?\d%K%P
\dFive...\d%K%P
She peered over the sheet with worried eyes.%K%P
\dThey all seem pretty heavy too.\d%K%P
The skewered konnyaku was one thing, but the thick\nnoodle yakisoba and the mountain veggies with rice\nwas a bit much to handle.%K%P
\dCan't we just get the stamps and bring the food\nhome?\d%K%P
\dBut it's at its best right now...\d%K%P
Kaede was serving up her very best cooking.%K%P
By re-frying things right when they were ordered\nshe was keeping everything fast and tasty.%K%P
\dThe whole stamp collection thing is a huge hit. I\nthink we should do it every year.\d%K%P
\dShion did good work there. The festival wouldn't\nhave come this far with the special food menu\nalone.\d%K%P
\dPeople are talking about how good the food is.\nLook at that couple eating over there.\d%K%P
\dAll lovey-dovey, huh?\d%K%P
It was adorable watching the two have fun sharing\nthe food with each other.%K%P
\dIf they're still here now, think they'll hang\naround for the voting?\d%K%P
The stamp cards let everyone know about the vote\nthat night.%K%P
There were even some prizes ready, which would\nencourage people to stick around.%K%P
Shion and Kaede had really pulled off some magic\nthis year.%K%P
Yukari though, she just enjoyed the festival with\nme.%K%P
Her plan was to show off our relationship, but how\nmuch did people even notice?%K%P
I still wasn't so sure.%K%P
And just like that the evening was upon us.%K%P
The falls were still lit up, but the food was all\nput away.%K%P
The stamp collection also moved over to the shrine\nas people gathered up for prizes.%K%P
The braziers were lit, and the flames danced into\nthe sky.%K%P
Building up to the grand finale, all unnecessary\nlights were turned off.%K%P
The fall festival was a harvest feast.%K%P
But it was also to honor the shrine's deity, Kaede.%K%P
The main shrine was probably performing their\nritual now.%K%P
Out here things were much less formal. Goddesses\nand humans were living side by side, after all.%K%P
We had the Goddesses and their supporters.%K%P
By the light of the fire, I could see the smiles\non everybody's faces.%K%P
\dIt's about time...\d%K%P
I still wasn't qualified to carry things out on my\nown.%K%P
So we had one of our regulars act as MC and lead\nus through the voting.%K%P
\dLadies and gentlemen, thank you all for waiting!\d%K%P
\dWe are about to kick off our final festival event!\d%K%P
\dAs was announced earlier, we have three Goddesses\nwith us here today.\d%K%P
\dAnd all of you are going to decide which of the\nthree helped the most to make the festival such a\nsuccess.\d%K%P
She gave a quick rundown of how it would work,\nand introduced the three of them.%K%P
\dFirst we have our local shrine's deity, the holy\nKaede Shizumori!\d%K%P
\dThat's me, good evening everyone. Are you\nenjoying yourselves?\d%K%P
With a smile and a wave she got the crowd cheering.%K%P
A beautiful girl like her working out there in\nfront of everyone all day was bound to be\nremembered.%K%P
\dNext we have the holy Shion Misono!\d%K%P
\dHiya! I made this whole thing more lively than\never, so vote for me!\d%K%P
\dWoo! Shiooon!\d%K%P
\dThank you all!\d%K%P
She got a roar from her groupies.%K%P
She was really popular with those sorts.%K%P
\dAnd last we have the holy Yukari Amatsu!\d%K%P
But there was no response, and Yukari was nowhere\nto be seen.%K%P
\dYukari...?\d%K%P
\dWhere's she done gone off to?\d%K%P
\dWhere could she have gone...?\d%K%P
\dWant me to go look for her?\d%K%P
The place grew anxious at her disappearance.%K%P
But still, we had to proceed.%K%P
Or so I thought, but then she showed up in the most\nunexpected of places.%K%P
She stood silent on the wing of the stage.%K%P
\dThat would be me, Yukari Amatsu.\d%K%P
\dUnlike Kaede and Shion, I am new to Kamimori.\d%K%P
\dSo instead of introducing myself, I shall perform\na special dance for all of you.\d%K%P
She took this moment as her last chance.%K%P
She had waited for the most heated moment to put\non her performance.%K%P
\dWait, is she serious?\d%K%P
\dThis could be bad. She's gonna steal our thunder!\d%K%P
Yukari was the only dancer on stage.%K%P
There were no flutes, no drums, just one Goddess\nabout to dance.%K%P
\dHold it right there!\d%K%P
\dWe're gonna dance too!\d%K%P
Thinking they'd lose if they didn't do something,\nKaede and Shion barged into Yukari's performance.%K%P
\dJust don't get in my way...\d%K%P
\dDo you know who you're talking to?\d%K%P
\dYeah, even I can dance!\d%K%P
\dThen let us begin.\d%K%P
\dThis dance is to celebrate the land of Kamimori\nand the people who live upon it...\d%K%P
Bells rang out.%K%P
And as they did, the three began.%K%P
Yukari danced pompously.%K%P
Shion danced brilliantly.%K%P
Kaede danced elegantly.%K%P
Each started in their own style, but soon they all\nmerged into one spectacular performance.%K%P
Even those in the audience who had looked on with\nuncertainty at first were transfixed by it.%K%P
\dWow... They're so in sync.\d%K%P
It was hard to imagine they were at each other's\nthroats just moments ago.%K%P
They each had their own mannerisms, but they all\ncame together.%K%P
It was truly divine bliss.%K%P
The light from the fire colored them red, and made\nthe whole thing quite magical.%K%P
Then the bells rang again.%K%P
Once, twice, three times.%K%P
They spun as if raining miracles down upon\neveryone watching.%K%P
With heavenly grace bestowed upon them everyone\nfelt uplifted.%K%P
And with that their performance came to an end.%K%P
Slightly out of breath, Yukari stepped down in\nfront of the crowd.%K%P
\dAgain, I am Yukari Amatsu.\d%K%P
\dIt was only recently that fate led me here.\d%K%P
She spoke passionately and everyone listened.%K%P
\dThat very same fate led me to Akira Manase...\d%K%P
\dAnd he and I were bound together, now as husband\nand wife.\d%K%P
\dI would like to take this moment here, before you\nall, to make this known to all...\d%K%P
\dNow hold it right there! Who do you think you are\njust blurting that out at a time like this!\d%K%P
\dYeah! Neither of us accept you as his wife, you\nknow!\d%K%P
Kaede and Shion couldn't let that slide by.%K%P
\dCould you stop? This is an important moment for\nme.\d%K%P
She wasn't going to wait for the vote, she was\ngoing for it now.%K%P
This was her real plan.%K%P
\dDon't go parading this around as fact!\d%K%P
\dI too will take this moment to declare myself as\nAkira's better half!\d%K%P
\dAnd I'm his mistress!\d%K%P
\dEhehehe! So you plan on ruining our moment of\nhappiness, do you?\d%K%P
\dNo, we plan on joining you!\d%K%P
\dWe're not gonna let you leave us out of this!\d%K%P
\dNgggh...\d%K%P
Yukari was outnumbered.%K%P
She lost the words to fight back, but instead\nraised her hand for help.%K%P
\dAkira!\d%K%P
\dAkira, oh my beloved husband!\d%K%P
\dWho do you truly choose as your partner?\d%K%P
She threw the decision my way.%K%P
Suddenly all eyes were on me.%K%P
You could feel the tension in the air.%K%P
\dAkira!\d%K%P
\dAki!\d%K%P
\dAkira, please.\d%K%P
Some kind of halfhearted decision wouldn't do.%K%P
\dFine. Let's settle this once and for all!\d%K%P
\dMy wife! My better half! And my mistress!\d%K%P
\dI choose you all! Yukari, Shion, and Kaede, I'll\nmarry all three of you!\d%K%P
I could never choose just one of them.%K%P
I loved them all too much for that.%K%P
Sure we had our troubles, but we all lived together\nand grew to understand one another.%K%P
\dA-Akira... So you choose me, then...\d%K%P
\dWhat? No! He chose us all!\d%K%P
\dAt the very least, none of us have to go home\ncrying...\d%K%P
\dLet's figure out who he loves most, then!\d%K%P
\dJust forget about that.\d%K%P
I laughed and gave her a hug.%K%P
I waved the other two over as well.%K%P
\dYou're all mine!\d%K%P
\dI'll make sure I look after you all so that you\nall feel you're my number one!\d%K%P
I didn't think there was really any reason to put a\nnumber on anyone.%K%P
Maybe it was selfish to claim everyone was number\none, but this was my choice.%K%P
\dAkira... Oh you truly are the one...\d%K%P
\dYou can be a true man when it counts, huh Aki?\d%K%P
\dAh-ha, I agree. Good work, Akira.\d%K%P
Yukari, Shion, and Kaede.%K%P
As of this day, the three of them were officially\nmy spouses.%K%P
Everyone gathered here celebrated that fact...%K%P
\dYou better make me happy, you hear?\d%K%P
She cuddled up to my arm.%K%P
\dI'll make you happy though, Aki.\d%K%P
Shion stood up on her toes with a smile on her\nface.%K%P
\dAnd I'll make everyone happy.\d%K%P
Kaede drew all of us in together.%K%P
\dLet's all keep getting along, yeah?\d%K%P
\dOf course!\d%K%P
There is an old story in Kamimori.%K%P
That those who profess their love at the autumn\nfestival will live happily ever after...%K%P
Is happiness something we are given?%K%P
No, I think not.%K%P
Happiness is something you get when you seek it.%K%P
And I hope for it. I seek it.%K%P
Happiness for all of us, for ever and ever...%K%P
